title: Lady Killer
description: A serial killer is targeting beautiful women TV reporters and leaving voicemail for journalist Susanne Amanti saying it is all being done for her. Ritualistic and sadistic murders. Crime scenes with no evidence. With the clock ticking on a media blackout, FBI profiler Tom Gracie and Homicide Detective Victoria Scott team up to catch the killer before another reporter is brutally and sadistically murdered.
author: David Krae
